name: 2017 The International Conference on Mechanical Science and Control Systems
content: 2017 The International Conference on Mechanical Science and Control Systems (ICMSCS 2017) will be held from March 11 to 12, 2017 in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. This Conference is co-organized by Hong Kong Association for Science and Engineering (HKASE) and it will cover issues on Mechanical Science and Control Systems. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods. The aim of ICMSCS 2017 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods in Mechanical Science and Control Systems. ICMSCS 2017 will be a valuable and important platform for inspiring international and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Mechanical Science and Control Systems.bsp;We cordially invite you to participate in ICMSCS 2017 and look forward to seeing you in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, during March 11 to 12, 2017.
organizers: Hong Kong Association for Science and Engineering（HKASE）
